messages.subject: L.A. Times article on homeschooling/unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: My family is featured in the L.A. Times today. http://tinyurl.com/3yhujp While the school-at-home family made top billing, I m thrilled that unschooling is
messages.messageBody:
My family is featured in the L.A. Times today.
http://tinyurl.com/3yhujp

While the school-at-home family made top billing, I'm thrilled that
unschooling is represented! Take a look at the video link
called "Unschooling" to the right of the article.

It's not a substantial article, but I think it's hard to make what we
do sound substantial! All we do is play, and it's not "play with a
purpose" either. It really does look like the picture she painted; Eat,
Play, Trust :) Oh ... and the incredibly entertaining dance of the oh,
so middle-of-the-road guy and his beloved wife who rarely
steps foot on anything paved. ;)

Enjoy!
Michelle
